## Adobe Reader Touch for Windows 10

**Adobe Reader Touch** for Windows 10 is a free PDF reader that can open and manipulate PDF files on your PC or tablet. This version of Adobe Reader is designed to work seamlessly with the touch interface of Windows 10 devices. In this article, we will discuss the key features of Adobe Reader Touch and how it can benefit you.

### Key Features

1. PDF viewing - Adobe Reader Touch allows you to view PDF documents on your Windows 10 device. You can zoom in and out of pages, scroll through documents, and search for specific words or phrases.

2. PDF editing - You can also use Adobe Reader Touch to edit PDF documents. You can add text to a page, highlight text, and even draw on the document. You can also add notes, comments, and bookmarks to a PDF document.

3. Collaboration - Adobe Reader Touch makes it easy to collaborate with others on a PDF document. You can share a file with others, and they can add comments and suggestions to the document.

4. Cloud storage - Adobe Reader Touch can be linked to your cloud storage account, allowing you to access and save PDF documents from anywhere.

5. Security - Adobe Reader Touch has security features that keep your PDF documents safe. You can password-protect a file or set permissions for who can view or edit the document.

### Benefits

1. Easy to use - Adobe Reader Touch has a simple and intuitive interface that is easy to use. You can quickly navigate through documents, add notes and comments, and share files with others.

2. Syncs with other devices - If you have Adobe Reader Touch on your Windows 10 device, you can access your PDF documents from other devices that are linked to your cloud storage account.

3. Free - Adobe Reader Touch is a free app that you can download from the Windows Store.

4. Works with touch screen devices - Adobe Reader Touch is designed to work seamlessly with touch screen devices, making it easy to navigate through documents and edit them.

5. Secure - With its security features, you can be confident that your PDF documents are safe and protected.

### Conclusion

In summary, Adobe Reader Touch for Windows 10 is a versatile app that can help you view, edit, and collaborate on PDF documents. With its user-friendly interface, compatibility with touch screen devices, and security features, it is a reliable choice for anyone who needs to work with PDF documents on their Windows 10 device. Best of all, it is free and can be downloaded from the Windows Store.
